name: Led Audio Visualiser
description:
Takes an incoming stream of audio runs it through a fast fourier transform
algorithm, then sends it over Wi-Fi to a receiver (e.g. ESP8266 Microcontroller) and
visualises it physically through an array of 150 LEDs. The client has been written in
C# and C, utilsing WSAPI (windows) and the ALSA PulseAudio API (Linux & limited
android support)

name: Sudoku Solver
description:
Solves Sudoku puzzles utilising a brute force DFS (Depth First Search) algorithm,
includes functionality to generate valid, solvable Sudoku puzzles of varying difficulty

name: Web Resume
description:
A small website created to display up to date information
about my projects and other information that I find relevant to share

name: Java - Spigot Auto Sort
description:
Uses SpigotMC to write custom plugins, this particular plugin is designed to
search x radius of chunks for specific entities and then sorts them based on the contents.

name: MultiThreaded Prime Finder
description:
This is a multi-threaded program which has been designed to efficiency find prime
numbers given n as a target input

name: Unity GameDevHQ BootCamp
description:
This was a Tower Defense game built during my GameDev BootCamp. It
involved designing editor tools to streamline unit creation, wave creation, and utilised
programming design patterns such as Singletons, and Object Pooling for efficiency

name: GMTK GameJam 2020
description: placeholder desc -- Theme Out of Control

name: Unity + PayPal
description:
This implementation integrates in-game UI with PayPal to allow for users
to make a purchase which will then perform X action in game.
